com.aliyun.oss.common.comm

类 ServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aliyun.oss.common.comm.ServiceClient
  • 直接已知子类:
    DefaultServiceClient

    public abstract class ServiceClient
extends Object
    Abstract service client that provides interfaces to access OSS services.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  ServiceClient.Request
      Wrapper class based on HttpMessage that represents HTTP request message to OSS.
